PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-03992011-03-10,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Prescribing Public Officers
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING PUBLIC OFFICERS, to ensure that Parliamentary security officers are able to continue to perform their duties in all of the Parliamentary Precinct buildings, whether on or off Parliament Hill, and not be restrained operationally by the limiting clause "within the Parliamentary Precinct" that currently exists in the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0068 Publication Date: 2011-03-30
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Regulations Prescribing Public Officers
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING PUBLIC OFFICERS, to ensure that Parliamentary security officers are able to continue to perform their duties in all of the Parliamentary Precinct buildings, whether on or off Parliament Hill, and not be restrained operationally by the limiting clause "within the Parliamentary Precinct" that currently exists in the Regulations.
